test.name: LDAPSupport.TC.005
test.description:
Entry with msisdn value X send HTTP Request for the second time and query the LDAP server for the same msisdn (X). - - - Valid msisdn recieved.
Test Description: 1. Load LDAP and web servers 2. Send HTTP Get Proxy Request 3. Verify responses
Expected Result: - Verify that LDAP sends the Response with msisdn+ipaddress (with extra ldap attributes) although the user exist already in the PSE.
XTT Commands: startWebServer startLDAPServer 1. - Load ReqMod and workFlowConstants files 2. - sendGetRequest "http://www.724xtt.com/index/test1.html" 3. - checkResponseCode "HTTP 200" 4. - verify LDAP responses via logscan 4. - Load Empty Request Modification File stopLDAPServer stopWebServer
